description: Set out on any hiking adventure in the Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX, with waterproof GORE-TEX product technology, which is guaranteed by GORE-TEX to keep you protected from the elements. According to Vibram®, a grippy Vibram® Megagrip outsole gives you unparalleled grip on wet or dry surfaces. Our Original FootShape™ Fit gives your feet room to spread out and move naturally and a mid-cut design gives your ankles added support so you can stay out there longer and keep discovering.
name: Altra Olympus 5 Hike GTX Mid - Mens

specs.value: These canted lugs on the outsole are strategically placed beneath the metatarsals to provide added traction underfoot
These grid-like grooves in the midsole are designed to provide flexibility and movement
